snippet.title: Dead Cells: Rise of the Giant DLC, Major update... Thing - An animated trailer
snippet.description:
Dead Cells is getting a brand new FREE DLC, with two new levels and new bosses! Check it out in this funny little animated trailer we made with the guys from Bobby Prod. Music by Yoann "Valmont" Laulan. 

Here's our intractable (anti?)hero getting his first taste of the kind of challenge that we're planning to bring you on March 28th 2019. Prepare to get your butt kicked, but have a bunch of fun and laughs while you're at it! We hope...

Want the music ? Find it on Youtube here https://youtu.be/hXOFusXmPfg and download it on Valmont's bandcamp: https://valmontderagondas.bandcamp.com/track/dead-cells-animated-i-am-the-machine

Director : Jérémie Hoarau
Script : Balak, Jérémie Hoarau
Storyboard : Balak
Backgrounds : Ermel Vialet, Thomas Greffard
Layout Posing : Jérémie Hoarau
Animation : Juanma Laguna, Clément Kubicek, Jérémie Hoarau
FX : Fred Macé, Juanma Laguna, Jérémie Hoarau
Compositing : Grégoire Peyrot
Production : Bobby Prod
Producer : David Alric
Production Manager : Jérôme Bonnaventurier

- Twitter : @bobbyprod_off
https://twitter.com/bobbyprod_off

- Facebook : @BobbyProdAnimation
https://www.facebook.com/BobbyProdAnimation/

- Instagram : @bobbyprod 
https://www.instagram.com/bobbyprod/
